title: Grandfather's mitten
brief_description: A puppet animated film with bright music about a family of mice who make their home in a discarded mitten and their succession of new boarders. Provides a lesson in cooperative living.
description: A puppet animated film with bright music about a family of mice who make their home in a discarded mitten and their succession of new boarders. Provides a lesson in cooperative living.
